name: Ken Moons Quest for Poop
description:
Journey through a spooky area and find all 5 items to escape the Cum Moon clones

Created by Cortana The Smerg for https://www.twitch.tv/moonmoon 2020 Game Jam in 72 hours.

This version includes 2 fixes for bugs in the version moonmoon played. The fixes are opening message now correctly says 5 items, "you dont have all 5" message disappears correctly now.

1 Bug remains from moonmoon's version that prevents dogs from spawning correctly.

Keyboard Controls :
[E] Interact
[Left Shift] Sprint
[Tab] Menu
[Space Bar] Jump
[Left Ctrl] Crouch
[F] Flashlight
